EmailTemplate.name: Salesforce Release Broadcast
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Salesforce Sales Cloud - Maintenance Broadcast (4.30 - 9.30 PM CST on 12/16/2020)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning!
Salesforce Sales Cloud - Maintenance Broadcast - Expecto Patronum Release
Salesforce Team will be deploying enhancements to our Salesforce Sales Cloud on Wednesday, Nov 18th from 4.30 PM CST through 9.30 PM CST.
Salesforce may not work as expected during this time which may result in data loss and corruption. Please plan accordingly. You will be notified as soon as the system is fully functional and ready to use.
Questions? Send message to crmrequest@livongo.com
Thank you!
